title: sleep-debt-tracker
description: The sleep-debt-tracker repository is a project built with TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML, designed to help users monitor and manage their accumulated sleep debt. This application allows users to track their sleep schedules, calculate their sleep debt, and visualize their progress, all within a user-friendly interface. It demonstrates practical application of TypeScript for building interactive web applications.

title: next-voting
description: Next-Voting is a project showcasing a modern voting application built with TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript. This repository contains the code and assets for a user-friendly and robust system, ideal for implementing voting mechanisms in various online platforms or applications. It serves as a practical example and potential starting point for projects related to voting systems, web development, and front-end architecture.

title: robofleet-dashboard
description: The robofleet-dashboard repository provides a user-friendly interface for monitoring and controlling Robofleet-enabled robots. Built using JavaScript, Python, HTML, and CSS, this project offers a web-based dashboard for visualizing robot status, managing tasks, and interacting with robot systems, contributing to a more efficient and intuitive robotics workflow.

title: Map-Visualisation
description: Map-Visualisation is a project exploring the creation of interactive and informative map visualizations. Built using HTML for the front-end and Python for data processing and potentially backend logic (depending on implementation), this repository demonstrates techniques for presenting geographical data in a visually compelling way. The project encompasses various aspects of map creation, data integration, and user interaction, offering a foundation for building custom mapping applications.

title: jovian
description: Jovian is a Python-based CRUD application built with Flask, PostgreSQL, HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting. This project demonstrates a functional web application showcasing data management using a robust backend framework and a relational database, covering topics such as CRUD operations, web development with Flask, and database integration with PostgreSQL.

title: ros-log-viewer
description: ros-log-viewer is a web-based tool for visualizing and analyzing ROS (Robot Operating System) log files. Built with JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting, this project provides an intuitive interface for filtering, searching, and interpreting ROS log data, making it easier to debug and understand robotic system behavior.

title: resume
description: This repository contains the source code for my resume, built using LaTeX for print and HTML for online viewing. The project showcases my skills in both document formatting and web development, demonstrating my ability to create professional and accessible resumes. It serves as a personal project to manage and maintain my resume in a version-controlled environment.

title: next-idea-board
description: Next-idea-board is a project focused on providing a dynamic and interactive idea board, built using TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript. This repository houses the codebase for a tool that allows users to brainstorm, organize, and prioritize ideas in a collaborative and visually appealing manner. It leverages modern web development techniques to create a user-friendly experience for project planning and innovation.

title: NextJs-Dashboard
description: NextJs-Dashboard is a project showcasing a responsive and interactive dashboard built with Next.js, leveraging the power of TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript for a modern and dynamic user experience. This repository serves as a practical example of building a complete web application with Next.js, incorporating best practices for component design, data management, and styling.

title: genietalks
description: GenieTalks is a project built with TypeScript, CSS, JavaScript, and HTML, leveraging Express.js and Vite.js to create an application that interacts with the Gemini API. The repository demonstrates a practical implementation of these technologies, showcasing their integration within a modern web development workflow.

title: devboard
description: Devboard is a project management application built with Next.js 14 utilizing the Pages Router, TypeScript, and CSS for styling. This project leverages MUI for UI components and React Query for efficient data fetching and caching, providing a robust and performant solution for organizing and tracking project tasks.

title: dynamic-event-calendar
description: Dynamic-Event-Calendar is a JavaScript, CSS, and HTML-based project that aims to provide a customizable and interactive event calendar solution. This repository houses the code for creating a dynamically updated calendar interface, allowing users to easily view, add, and manage events, making it a valuable resource for anyone seeking to integrate event scheduling functionality into their web applications.

title: iot-asset-tracking
description: iot-asset-tracking is a Next.js project built with TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript to demonstrate a modern IoT asset tracking application. It utilizes Supabase for backend services and Tailwind CSS for styling, showcasing best practices for building scalable and maintainable web applications with a focus on project structure, TypeScript implementation, and seamless integration with cloud-based services.

title: finance-with-python
description: This repository contains a collection of Jupyter Notebook projects exploring various finance concepts and applications using Python. It leverages Python libraries to analyze financial data, build models, and perform calculations, covering topics such as investment strategies, portfolio optimization, risk management, and market analysis.

title: fruit-seller
description: Fruit-Seller is an e-commerce project built with Next.js 14 using the Pages Router, TypeScript, and JavaScript. It leverages React Query for data fetching and MUI for a rich user interface, demonstrating a type-safe approach to building a modern web application. The repository showcases key e-commerce functionalities and serves as a learning resource for those interested in combining these technologies.
